channel.title: Stellar dawn art competetion concepts
channel.description:
well im defntally entering this: [url=http://services.stellardawn.com/m=news/stellar-dawn-art-competition]http://services.stellardawn.com/m=news/stellar-dawn-art-competition[/url] and atm im concepting, its just basic stuff atm, i just need to know the pro's and cons and what i need to improve :) i will be modeling my fave pic, and rendering it for entry in 2 weeks (i hope) im generally going for a ship coming out of the cosmos style thing, but also i want a planet in it.
anyway, enough talking, not enough art.
this one was themed just before the drop pods got launched, this is the pic i got the idea from: http://www.stellardawn.com/img/sdmain/images/falling-pods.jpg
this is my quick 5 Min sketch up [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2eq7wc7.jpg[/img]
just a very fast sketch, i was just trying to get some ideas here. [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/1z3ry90.jpg[/img]
drew a pic of what i want the final ship to look like, still got alot to do on it, but atm i am trying to get it to scale with eachother, but the bottom pic needs refining...
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2re7gk6.jpg[/img]
i will be uploading more as i make em.
~ shrogg

item.title: Stellar dawn art competetion concepts
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

ahhk, all guds, i was wondering why it was gone
but thats a good reason, thanks for that, i wont link to em again

Read full topic

item.title: Stellar dawn art competetion concepts
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Omg Mopar now you’ve got me scared they’re probably going to ban my main Zarfot D:

From what you’ve described it sounds like you’ve got a good idea going, I just want to see you pull it off now. Good luck

Read full topic

item.title: Stellar dawn art competetion concepts
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I removed the img tags from the image hotlinked from stellar-dawn.com, because automatically displaying the images gives jagex the IP of everyone who viewed this thread along with the referer of moparisthebest.com (bannable material)

You should never directly click a link to any of jagex’s websites from here without at least using HTTPS or a plugin to delete the referer header.

Read full topic

item.title: Stellar dawn art competetion concepts
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

thanks, well im now thinking about modeling the interrior of a cabin as the planet is coming into view (am gonna start drawing soon) with the sun directly behind the planet, but im not too sure

Read full topic

Modeling a good looking spaceship is a tricky task, good luck.
